title: Transfer Issue
body: I just transfer my account from LAN to NA few minutes ago and I'm unable to login??? says "invalid username/password." I mean C'mon I know them by heart there's no way its wrong. Transfer usually is done instantly, its not the first time I transfer so I know. . .

replies.body:
Since this is specifically about your account transfer that we'll need to look into, I recommend reaching out to our account specialists in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
yeah I did that the same day I post this, how long does it take them to reply my ticket?

Longer than normal, since we've had a big influx of tickets lately. I can't specify an amount of time, but if you remain patient, we'll have a specialist reach out as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
i really want to play with my friends tonight and I've google the problem looks like it'll take very long to solve this problem, fuckkk im so pisssssssssssss
